item.description: Join Raw & Living Foods Chef Eden Love for the first class of a 5-class series! In this class we will learn how to make a couple of our all-time faves – pizza and chocolate-chip cookies – all RAW, super-nutritious, and high-vibrational! This class includes instruction on both dehydrated and non-dehydrated items. Learn just how amazingly delicious and decadent raw foods can be! Learn the skills to create the healthy (and more delicious) versions of these foods when the cravings hit! All classes held at Alchemy Juice Bar Cafe, 203 New Britain Avenue, Hartford, CT, and run from 7:00-8:30 pm. All classes are $25 per person, except where noted. Register for all 5 classes for only $100, a raw-some deal! To register for classes, please RSVP here on Meetup or e-mail Eden at: LoveAliveforLife@gmail.com. About Eden Love: Eden Love is a super-nutritarian chef-goddess, mama-preneur, passionate teacher of the high-vibration lifestyle, and co-author of the soon-to-be-released Mama-licious: Recipes for a High Vibration Lifestyle, which is a book empowering women and mothers with the information and inspiration to be their most healthy, vibrant & authentic selves. She is also the owner of the company, Love Alive: High-Vibrational Living Foods for Ecstatic Super-Beings. She hand-crafts nutrient-dense, ecstatic living foods, superfoods, chocolates and elixirs made with the frequency of love, joy, and bliss! Eden teaches classes and workshops on a regular basis, empowering others to nourish their whole selves with the most nutrient-dense foods on the planet! Eden is the mother of a very special being of light, Indigo, who is her most profound teacher, and for whom she is immensely grateful. She lives her life every day with the question, “What would love do?” The answers are about opening to her most sacred self – to the creative, succulent, radiant, powerful, light-filled, ecstatic being that she is. In the name of personal and planetary transformation, she urges you to awake, remember who you are, and join her in being LOVE.
item.name: Favorite Comfort Foods - RAW!
